title: Oscar Blandi Pronto Invisible Volumizing Dry Shampoo Spray, 5 Ounce
description: Clear the way for the newest innovation in dry shampoo. Pronto dry shampoo invisible sprays on clear, which means it's completely undetectable in the hair and is ideal for all hair color. When applied, it instantly boosts volume and cleanses the hair without water. Ingredients such as gentle starches absorb excess oil and product build-up, while vitamin E and wheat proteins strengthen and protect the hair shaft. The end result is that hair looks and feels freshly shampooed, without a trace of residue.

title: Jojoba Oil, Golden Organic 100% Pure 12 Oz
description: Jojoba oil comes from the beans of the shrub like plant, simmondsia chinensis. This is the highest grade certified organic, cold pressed oil (actually a liquid plant wax). It is bright and golden in color and is regarded as the most favored in the carrier oil family because of its advanced molecular stability. Also makes a great scalp cleanser for the hair, and is equally wonderful for the skin because it has absorption properties that are similar to our skins own sebum.

title: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus Curl & Style Milk 8Oz
description: Shea Moisture Coconut Hibiscus Curl & Style Milk has coconut oil, silk protein and neem oil that adds moisture, body and shine to your curls. Keeps curly hair frizz-free, shiny and healthy.

title: It's a 10 Miracle Deep Conditioner Plus Keratin, 5 oz
description: Does 10 Things Instantly. Keratin portein enriched, deeply moisturizes. Superior penetration, smoothes, detangles. Restores elasticity and strength, protects color, helps prevent split ends, adds shine and protects from sun damage.

title: Soft 'N Style 60 Piece Rubber Rod Set
description: Zippered carry case includes: 2 Packs of Purple (7/8"), 2 Packs of Grey ( 3/4"), 2 Packs of Orange ( 5/8"), 1 Pack of Blue ( 1/2"), 1 Pack of Red ( 7/16"), 1 Pack of Yellow ( 3/8"), 1 Pack of Green ( 1/4").

title: The Body Shop Exfoliating Body Polisher Skin Towel,  Green
description: You'll love how these exfoliating skin towels are fast drying, too....

title: Shea Butter - Molivera Organics 16 Oz. Premium Raw Unrefined African Organic Grade A Ivory Shea Butter for Natural Skin Care, Hair Care and Body Butters - 100% Pure and Double Filtered - Great for Acne, Stretch Marks, Eczema Etc - Great for Daily Moisturizer and For DIY Recipes - Karite SheaButter From Ghana - UV Resistant BPA Free Jar - 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
description:

- Natural sun block?IMAGINE FINALLY FINDING YOUR GO-TO BEAUTY PRODUCT IN MOLIVERA ORGANICS RAW AFRICAN IVORY SHEA BUTTER -Our butter is unrefined, meaning it has not gone through a chemical extraction process that overheats and bleaches the butter leaving it with less of its healing properties. Our butter is pure ivory. Yellow Shea butter can be a sign that the butter has more impurities or that coloring has been added. Because our butter is so pure, its softer, has a light nutty scent, and is never gritty, as you may sometimes find with others. Shea butter is ultra healing because it has high contents of antioxidants, essential fatty acids, vitamins A, D, E, and F, and UV ray protection.We send you our butter in a UV protective bottle. Exposure to light can degrade the butters natural properties. Our bottle helps to keep out light and keep the healing properties strong. Our butter is sealed in our controlled environment and will come to you just as you see it. It will not come yellow, rancid, gritty, or in a zip lock bag-like some others.IT'S A SHAME FOR YOU NOT TO REAP THE BENEFITS OF THIS NATURAL BEAUTY SERUM, WHEN IT HAS BEEN USED BY MILLIONS FOR CENTURIES.We guarantee you will be 100% satisfied and in love with your new skin or your money back.SO, EMPTY OUT YOUR BEAUTY CABINET, AND ADD MOLIVERA ORGANICS RAW AFRICAN IVORY SHEA BUTTER TO YOUR CART NOW AND 
ENJOY BEING IN YOUR OWN SKIN.
